title: Skin gifting
body: i gifted my friend a skin and after he got out of the match he was in he got permabanned. Is there anyway i can get refunded the RP i spent or is it just gone forever now.

replies.body:
Damn, that is some terrible timing and some bad luck :(  

Unfortunately, we do not reverse any kind of RP gifting/purchases for permabanned accounts.  The content there is locked...well, permanently.  I wish I had some better news to share >.<
well that sucks. thank you for commenting and telling me though....
